Name: История бомжа 2: полицейский беспредел
About the game: Homeless Story 2: Police Mayhem is a third person adventure. This is a sequel to the legendary game Story of a Homeless. Find out how the story of our beloved homeless Artyom ended. Feel all the hardships of a homeless person's life. In this game you will find a dizzying story about life in a Russian prison and not only... UNIQUE WORLD In the new game, Story of a Homeless 2: Police Mayhem, you will again be homeless Artem and go through all the hardships of this world. ADVANCED GRAPHICS AND GAMEPLAY The game Story of a Homeless 2: Police Mayhem has very beautiful graphics and catchy gameplay!
